task.title: Evaluate Fly.io Sprites and implement workspace resilience

events.content: Keep Fly.io Machines instead of adopting Sprites: Keep Fly.io Machines instead of adopting Sprites

raw.question: Keep Fly.io Machines instead of adopting Sprites
raw.chosen: Keep Fly.io Machines instead of adopting Sprites
raw.reasoning: Sprites designed for ephemeral AI code execution, not long-running agent sessions. Current Machines provide same Firecracker isolation at ~5x lower cost for our use case.

events.content: Add automated volume snapshots with 14-day retention: Add automated volume snapshots with 14-day retention

raw.question: Add automated volume snapshots with 14-day retention
raw.chosen: Add automated volume snapshots with 14-day retention
raw.reasoning: Fly.io provides built-in daily snapshots at $0.08/GB/month. 14-day retention provides good recovery window with minimal cost impact (~$0.50-1.50/month per workspace).

events.content: Create volumes explicitly via API before machines: Create volumes explicitly via API before machines

raw.question: Create volumes explicitly via API before machines
raw.chosen: Create volumes explicitly via API before machines
raw.reasoning: Explicit volume creation allows setting snapshot_retention and auto_backup_enabled parameters that are not configurable through fly.toml mounts section.

retrospective.summary: Evaluated Fly.io Sprites - not suitable for agent hosting (designed for code sandboxing). Implemented automated volume snapshots with 14-day retention for workspace resilience. Added snapshot management API methods (createSnapshot, listSnapshots, getVolumeId) to WorkspaceProvisioner.
